texts.text: Health potion: recover part of your life when using it.
Mana potion: recover part of your magic when using it.
Clover: recover your full life and magic when using it.
Small key: open some of the locked doors.
Horse: you can ride it on outside maps.
Dino fly: you can fly it on outside maps.
Protopack: can be used to fly over water.
Kash(es): money used on Twinsun
Feather, you can use it to write letters.
Architect's father
My house key
Note to myself: here is an extra key from my house in the case I loose mine again.
Gazoline, used by cars and motorbike.
Ferry ticket, you need one to take the ferry.
Glass of Champagne: there is nothing better to celebrate!
Glass of Gluehwein: this can keep you warm for the evening.
Lebkuchen: delicious cake!
Christmas candy cane: you can not get enough of this sweets.
Lbanet Christmas 2009 gift: strangly there is nothing inside yet...
Hair dryer 5000W: amazing power!
Grain bag: for a big hunger
Lbanet 1 year birthday cake: this cake is not a lie and looks delicious!
Magic ball
Saber
Prisoner outfit
Nurse outfit
Tunic outfit
Tunic and medailon outfit
Lbanet Christmas 2010 gift: it seems to be locked for now...
